casebody.data:
Wednesday, April 8, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

96-2442. Richwalsky v. ABF Freight Sys., Inc.

Hamilton App. No. C-960064. Sua sponte, stay of briefing vacated and parties are to brief the merits; cause consolidated with 97-2380 and 97-2510, Kaiser v. Ameritemps, Inc., Summit App. No. 18205.
